text.div:
patientDeathDateSearchParameter

Parameter death-date:date

Searches based on the death date of the patient (if any) eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Patient?death-date={date}

ResourcePatient
Expression(none)
Target ResourcesPatient
MultiplesThe parameter cannot repeat or have multiple values

name: patientDeathDateSearchParameter
description: Searches based on the death date of the patient (if any) eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Patient?death-date={date}
